channel.title: MarketWatch.com - Top Stories
channel.description: MarketWatch, a leading publisher of business and financial news, offers users up-to-the minute news, investment tools, and subscription products.
channel.copyright: Copyright © Dow Jones & Company, Inc. All rights reserved.

item.title: Are you making it in this economy, or just getting by? These two factors can determine your status.
item.description: The last four years ushered in a divided economy that left some Americans “clobbered” and others racing ahead. Two factors — homeownership and stock ownership — determined the difference.
item.author: Hannah Erin Lang

item.title: ‘I’ve never been happier’: I married a wonderful lady from Ukraine. I have two successful kids. Do I put my wife on the deed to my home?
item.description: “We are now looking to downsize and move to another home and I’m wondering if we should put the new property in joint names.”
item.author: Quentin Fottrell

item.title: Constellation to buy Calpine for $16 billion in deal combining nuclear, natural gas
item.description: Constellation Energy — the electricity provider whose stock has doubled over the last year on hopes it’ll help meet the voracious energy demand from artificial intelligence — reached a $16 billion deal to buy Calpine.
item.author: Steve Goldstein

item.title: Delta Air is betting on a strong 2025 driven by demand for premium travel
item.description: Delta Air Lines Inc.’s stock jumped 3.4% in premarket trade Friday, after the carrier beat fourth-quarter profit and revenue estimates and forecast a strong 2025 driven by demand for premium travel.
item.author: Ciara Linnane

item.title: Wall Street gets off to a bumpy start to 2025. How investors can prepare for more volatility ahead.
item.description: A sharp selloff in the world’s largest bond market sent shockwaves through the U.S. financial markets this week, leaving investors to ponder if that choppiness will persist throughout the new year.
item.author: Isabel Wang

item.title: Elevated Treasury yields are weighing on bitcoin. Here’s a case for it dropping to $90,000.
item.description: Bitcoin is on pace to record its third straight day of decline, as macroeconomic headwinds weighed on the crypto after it hit a record high near $110,000 last month.
item.author: Frances Yue

item.title: Jensen Huang crushed the quantum stocks, and now the so-called ‘Pharma Bro’ is going for the kill
item.description: Martin Shkreli says he’s short the likes of Rigetti Computing as market resembles the dotcom bubble
item.author: Jamie Chisholm

item.title: Are Roth IRAs really better? Not necessarily.
item.description: Roths may be overrated for most investors, new research suggests.
item.author: Brett Arends

item.title: Why Elon Musk had to drop his ‘DOGE’ pledge to cut $2 trillion from the federal budget
item.description: We told you he would months ago, when he made the promise.
item.author: Brett Arends

item.title: How helpful is auto-enrollment in 401(k) plans?
item.author: Alicia H. Munnell
